data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting (4 Of 2022) Of Jaykay Enterprises Limited Held On November 14, 2022.
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company in their Meeting held today has : -
1. Considered & approved the Consolidated and Standalone Un-Audited Financial Results for quarter and halfyear ended 30th September, 2022. We hereby enclose aforesaid Results along with Limited Review Report.
2. M/s Silvergrey Engineers moved into a new premise situated at Plot No. 477B, 4th Phase, Peenya Industrial Area, Bangalore- 560058.
3. Approval of Postal Ballot notice, inter-alia, to seek shareholders' approval for amending the object clause of MOA of the Company to include object relating to hotel/hospitality and other allied/related activities and to approve the proposed RPT u/s 188 of the Companies Act, 2013 w.r.t. matter relating to lease of portion of the property situated at J.K Building, Masjid Moth, Greater Kailash II, New Delhi to J.K. Cotton Limited, a related party.

data.caption: Inadvertent Omission Of Consolidated Limited Review Report In Quarterly Financial Results Of Jaykay Enterprises Limited For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2022 Due To Technical Issue Faced While Uploading On BSE Portal.
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), we had submitted the requisite disclosure in the prescribed format regarding the submission of financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2022 on August 10, 2022. However, it came to our notice that in the disclosure submitted by us, the Consolidated
Limited Review Report was inadvertently missed out due to technical issue due to techinal issue faced while uploading on BSE portal.

Accordingly, we are submitting requisite disclosure to your goodself for taking in your record.

Please find attached the requisite disclosure under Regulation 33 of Listing Regulations and oblige.

Further, we apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Thanking you.

data.caption: Approval Of Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of Jaykay Enterprises Limited For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2022.
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of Jaykay Enterprises Limited at its meeting held on August 10, 2022 has considered and approved the Standalone and Consolidated financial results of Jaykay Enterprises Limited for the quarter ended June 30, 2022.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting (2 Of 2022) Held On May 27, 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the applicable provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company in their Board Meeting held today has interalia: -
1. Considered, approved and taken on record the Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022. Accordingly, pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations), we enclose herewith aforesaid Results along with Auditors' Report. A copy of the above is uploaded in the Company's website www.jaykayenterprises.com.

Kindly take a note of the same.

Thanking you.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Q/E 31.12.2021
data.news_body:
As per the SEBI (LODR) Reg. 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors in its Meeting held today has interalia:-
1. Considered, approved and taken on record the Consolidated and Standalone Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine Months ended 31.12.2021.

2. Considered and approved the of resignation CS Prabhat Kumar Mishra (M. No. A29900) from the post of CFO & Company Secretary and KMP of the Company which will be effective from the closure of the Business hours of 10.02.2022.

3. Appointed CS Abhishek Pandey (M. No. A21958) as the Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of the Company under the Listing Regulations and designated him as the Whole-time KMP with effect from 11.02.2022.

Accordingly, pursuant to Listing Regulations, we enclose herewith aforesaid Results along with Limited Review Report. A copy of the above is uploaded in the website of the Company.
The meeting commenced at 12.00 Noon and concluded at 1.40 P.M.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for The Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On February 10, 2022
data.news_body:
As per the SEBI (LODR) Reg. 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors in its Meeting held today has interalia:-
1. Considered, approved, and taken on record the Consolidated and Standalone Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine Months ended 31.12.2021.
2. Considered and approved the of resignation CS Prabhat Kumar Mishra (M. No. A29900) from the post of CFO & Company Secretary and KMP of the Company which will be effective from the closure of the Business hours of 10.02.2022.
3. Appointed CS Abhishek Pandey (M. No. A21958) as the Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of the Company under the Listing Regulations and designated him as the Whole-time KMP with effect from 11.02.2022.
Accordingly, pursuant to Listing Regulations, we enclose herewith aforesaid Results along with Limited Review Report. A copy of the above is uploaded in the website of the Company.
The meeting commenced at 12.00 Noon and concluded at 1.40 P.M.

data.caption: The Outcome Of The Board Meeting (4Of 2021) Held On August 13 , 2021_Reclassification Of From Promoter Group Category To Public Category
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI LODR Reg 2015 (''LODR''),we wish to inform you that in its Meeting today Board has interalia Considered and anyalzed the request received from Ms Kalpana Singhania seeking Reclassification in shareholding from Promoter/Promoter Group to Public morefully described in the scanned letter attached.

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30,2021
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI LODR Reg 2015 (''LODR''),we wish to inform you that in its Meeting today Board has interalia approved Consolidated & Standalone Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter ended 30.06.2021 along with Limited Review Report thereon.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for The Outcome Of The Board Meeting (4 Of 2021) Held On August 13, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to SEBI LODR Reg 2015 (''LODR''),we wish to inform you that in its Meeting today Board has interalia:
1. Approved Consolidated & Standalone Unaudited Results for the Qtr ended 30.06.21 along with LR Report thereon
2. Reclassification in shareholding from Promoter/Promoter Group to Public morefully described in the scanned letter attached.
3. Decided to permanently close its RTA activities subject to completion of the necessary formalities in accordance with the SEBI (RTI& STA) Regulations, 1993.
4.Decided that M/s Alankit Assignments Limited will be appointed as the RTA of the Company subject to completion of necessary formalities
5 Decided that due to unavoidable circumstances/administrative reasons, AGM which was scheduled to be held on 18.09.21 stands deferred and re-scheduled to be held on 28.09.21 at Kanpur and consequent upon change the Book Closure for the purpose of AGM will commence from 21.09.21 to 28.09.21.
Commenced at:2:30P.M.
Concluded at: 3:45 P.M

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For The Quarter And Year End March 31,2021
data.news_body:
Please refer our earlier letter No Jaykay Ent./CS/209/2021/BM-3/ dated June 29, 2021 regarding the outcome of Board Meeting of the Company held on June 29,2021 which was duly uploaded on June 29, 2021 on the designated portal of BSE i.e www.listing.bseindia.com.

In regard we would like to inform that inadvertently the Consolidated Financial Results for the aforesaid period was skipped as Standalone Financial Results were scanned twicely and therewith were uploaded on the portal.

Hence we are submitting herewith revised copy of the results containing Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021.

Sorry for the inconvenience

Please take note of the same.

data.caption: Submission Of Standalone And Consolidated Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And The Year Ended March 31, 2021
data.news_body:
Please refer our earlier letter No Jaykay Ent./CS/209/2021/BM-3/ dated June 29, 2021 regarding the outcome of Board Meeting of the Company held on June 29,2021 which was duly uploaded on June 29, 2021 on the designated portal of BSE i.e www.listing.bseindia.com.

In regard we would like to inform that inadvertently the Consolidated Financial Results for the aforesaid period was skipped as Standalone Financial Results were scanned twicely and therewith were uploaded on the portal.

Hence we are submitting herewith revised copy of the results containing Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021.

Sorry for the inconvenience

Please take note of the same.

data.caption: The Outcome Of The Board Meeting (3 Of 2021) Held On June 29, 2021_Reclassification Of From Promoter Group Category To Public  Category
data.news_body: Pursuant to the applicable provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company in their Board Meeting held today has interalia Considered and analyzed the request received from M/s Yadu international limited, Mr. Nidhipati Singhania, Mr. Raghavpat Singhania, Mr. Madhavkrishna Singhania, Mr. A.K. Saraogi and Mr. Mr. Anil kumar Agarwal belonging to Promoter Group and/or PAC  seeking reclassification of their shareholding in the Company from Promoter Group Category to Public  Category and approved the reclassification subject to the approval of Shareholders in the ensuing Annual  General Meeting and BSE approval or such other approvals as maybe necessary in this regard.

data.caption: The Outcome Of The Board Meeting (3 Of 2021) Held On June 29, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to LODR Reg., 2015 ('LODR'), we wish to inform you that in its Meeting today Board has interalia:
1. approved CFS & SA AFR for the Qtr and FY ended 31.03.21 along with Auditors' Report thereon
2. Appointed Shri Abhishek Singhania (DIN-00087844) as Managing Director, for a period of 3 year w.e.f from 1.07.21 to 30.06.24 and Redesignated Shri Ashok Gupta (DIN-00135288) as Non-Executive, Non-Independent Director, subject to approval in the AGM.
3. Reclassification in shareholding from Promoter Group/PAC to Public morefully described in the scanned letter attached.
4. The new JV Co. Neumesh Labs Pvt. Ltd has been formed and started looking for space in Bengaluru to establish the Centre of Excellence (COE).
5. Decided that the AGM will be held on 18.9.21 at Kanpur and the Book Closure for the purpose of AGM will commence from 11.09.21 to 18.09.21.
Further, we are attaching the declaration as per Reg. 33(3)(d) of LODR.
Commenced at: 2:00 P.M.
Concluded at: 4:15 P.M
